attributes.action: Stop the premier league from charging fans £14.95 per game
attributes.additional_details: Fans are losing there jobs due to COVID losing homes and being made homeless and poverty on the rise due to COVID how do they expect fans to pay more money
attributes.background: To stop the premier league from charging fans extra money

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the Premier League.
